name: Tab Tree - dark devedition tweaks
description:
Some changes to make the tab tree better match the dark Developer Edition theme.
Assumes unloaded tab highlight is set to gray out.

Written in fx45.
https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/tab-tree/
additional_info:
Doesn't feel particularly well-written, and is full of (probably mostly unnecessary) !important lines, but feel free to use it as a base or whatever.



1.1 / 27 Mar 2016
 - added something for tab search highlight that isn't a pink outline

1.0 / 26 Mar 2016
 - initial release
